name: chatflow
description: A minimal but clean WhatsApp-style messaging app with Firestore and GCP Pub/Sub

scripts.firestore:setup: echo 'Setting up Firestore collections and indexes...' && gcloud firestore databases create --region=us-central1 --type=firestore-native || echo 'Database may already exist'
scripts.pubsub:setup: echo 'Setting up GCP Pub/Sub topics and subscriptions...' && gcloud pubsub topics create chatflow-events || echo 'Topic may already exist' && gcloud pubsub subscriptions create chatflow-events-subscription --topic=chatflow-events || echo 'Subscription may already exist'
scripts.gcp:setup: npm run firestore:setup && npm run pubsub:setup
scripts.docker:deploy: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:up
scripts.gcp:deploy: echo 'Deploying to Google Cloud...' && gcloud app deploy || echo 'Configure gcloud CLI and app.yaml first'
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run gcp:deploy
scripts.dev:full: npm run docker:up && npm run dev
